thread.title: Travel Professionals Share Insights on Tuning Up Your Business
thread.title_full: Travel Professionals Share Insights on Tuning Up Your Business

title: Travel Professionals Share Insights on Tuning Up Your Business
text:
Last updated: 11:00 AM ET, Fri October 02 2015 Travel Professionals Share Insights on Tuning Up Your Business Travel Agent | Tom Bastek | October 02, 2015 
The Agent@Home Travel Summit 2015 got off to a raring start on day two with a great panel presenting tools and advice to help tune up your business. The panel consisted of Scott Koepf from Avoya Travel , Cathy Kusuma from Cruise Planners and Sandra Blackwood from Nova Star Cruises . 
Kusuma started by sharing with the group some of the trends that are coming of age in the travel industy. They include the relatively new phenomenon of FOMO, or fear of missing out, a new trend made up of mostly millennials who see their friends having fun on social and are want to be there with them. < Do you want to read the full story? You must be a registered travel professional with an active account to view the full story. Are you a Travel Agent? Log in to your account now, or register for free!
